title: Zurück zum Absender
overview: One day can change the course of your whole life. Julian knows that. He lives in a small apartement with his father, who has been drinking ever since the death of his wife. However Julian found stability in his two good friends Andreas and Sophia. One day he suddenly finds something in the park, which he hesitantly takes with him. But he doesn't yet know how this find will drastically change his life. The first film production from 'filmABdate'.

title: Paloquemao: the Vampire Market
overview: Pedro is one of the vampires of underdevelopment who works amidst aisles full of garlic, fruits, herbs and crucifixes in the Paloquemao Market. However, on May 28, 2016, when the largest blood trafficking network in Bogota is dismantled, his dealer Harbey escapes and takes refuge in the market, threatening his relationship with Angie, the girl he is in love with.

title: HMP Full Sutton: Evil Behind Bars
overview: Exploring life at the high security prison which houses many notorious criminals.

title: Inside HMP Frankland: Evil Behind Bars
overview: Go behind the bars at HMP Frankland, which houses the most sadistic criminals in Britain.

title: The Fourth Wall
overview: A criminal discusses his case with his Lawyer only to find out that things aren't as they seem

title: Street Moves the Movie
overview: A local drug dealer seems to have it all under control until he makes a decision that would cost him everything in front of an undercover cop who was infiltrating his organization.
tagline: The choices you make in life, can cost you everything moving in these streets.

title: Murder on the Doorstep
overview: Documentary retracing one of Britain's most mysterious unsolved murders: the seemingly motiveless killing of a banker, executed on his doorstep, which has baffled detectives for almost 20 years.

title: Night Frames
overview: A university newspaper journalist investigates the shady happenings of an on-campus club.
tagline: Beware the Night Frames!

title: Lasting Impression
overview: Ezra Patterson is a famous author who has not written a single page in 5 years. After an odd encounter with his biggest fan, his writer's block may be coming to an end in an unexpected way.

title: The Good Christian
overview: A homicide detective returns to a bizarre case after a period away from his job that will expose him to demons of his past.

title: The True Story of the REALIFE Crash
overview: Two messy nerds try to hack into "cool guy's" social media profile to destroy his relationship, but instead they accidentally hack into the whole REALIFE (social media) system.

title: Finger Lickin the SHOW - "The Break In" PART ONE
overview: Seeking YouTube fame, Seamus and Travis somehow find themselves caught in a money laundering scheme run by the "Mexican Drug Cartel". BUT WHAT IS MONEY LAUNDERING? I don't know, and neither do they...
tagline: No one shoots a nice guy...

title: The Stalking Angel
overview: When the couple can see that their business partner in an appliances shop intends to defraud them and run with their money, while the breach of contract is expertly covered up, Karim and Sahar decide to take matters into their own hands and save their lives themselves.
tagline: When you're being defrauded & the law can't help you, help yourself. Break your illegitimate bully masters.

title: Voices of Reentry
overview: Four storytellers: George, Shaquan, Sing and Armando share portions of their life stories, illuminating the common threads that run through the experiences of many of the over two million people incarcerated in the United States. The film explores the challenges of reentry and the role communities can play in reducing these barriers.

title: Time Reversal Rescue Operation
overview: In 2066 the terminally ill scientist Chen Sen, director of the Rosebud Research Institute, sees a photo of his dead wife and son on the table, after which decides to change the past and rewrite history.

title: ROCKDALE
overview: A young lad tries to escape.
tagline: How much you hate your hometown?

title: A Good Friend
overview: The story of a little quarrel with a good friend.

title: The Five Steps
overview: A burglar goes over his five steps to success as he pulls off a job.
tagline: Crime does pay. Just not that much.

title: The Garden
overview: A magical garden that houses Alfredo's darkest secret.

title: Outsiders
overview: Two sisters living in poor conditions selling magazines door to door. They are to face a big adversity and must to stand up to it, if they want to survive.
tagline: Surviving demands your best performance.

title: Gatekeepers
overview: A car thief seeks to abandon his life style but his friend, a heist boss, refuses to allow it to happen.

title: القناع الأسود
overview: The story of a young boy who becomes a vigilante known only as the Black Mask

title: Socks and Robbers
overview: A gang of daring, sock-headed criminals commit the biggest bank heist in history but soon realise they've been intercepted, but who betrayed them?
tagline: Stitched up, undercover with nowhere to run.

title: Lawless Love
overview: Midnight. A construction site.  A man with a colored corn head and a woman with pink hair meet in a powerful encounter.  A provocative tale of love, right and wrong over a quarter of a century between two outcasts.  A sensational subject matter and a staggered ethical viewpoints are explored in this latest work of the artist's best work!  We run, leaving the world behind.

title: Failing Kansas New Zealand Festival 2002
overview: The 2002 performances of Failing Kansas at the New Zealand Festival created a scandal and ultimately a sensation. Credited with knocking Osama bin Laden off of the front page of the National newspaper and dominating TV and radio for days, the piece was ultimately a sold out triumph heralded as “A New Art Form." Now, almost twenty years later, Rouse has assembled the original footage and live recordings into a complete concert film.

title: Land for Sale
overview: A desperate battle to win a bidding war on a piece of land develops into a complex and intelligent story filled with twists and crazy humor.

title: HEIST
overview: A short film by Matthew Cutchen.

title: La malédiction des Dunois
overview: Following a murder in the town of Beaugency, a police captain, comedian in his spare time, will be appointed to lead the investigation. Accompanied by a chef who is just waiting for his retirement, a colorful colleague and a promising policeman, our four characters will have to investigate a historical intrigue mixing coat of arms, music box, mysterious sect and parchment which dates from the 15th century.

title: Peter K. - Alone against the State
overview: After the death of his mother, Peter K. is threatened with eviction from her home where he cared for her. He struggles to defend his refuge from his estranged sister, the city government, and finally, armed po- lice. His conspiracy theories and writings spiral into a violent reality, making him a renegade celebrity. His growing fear and solitude bring on childhood nightmares, while his court battle reveals a dark family past.

title: Denude
overview: Linda is a struggling single parent who is raising her mute daughter Annie, desperate for money, she seeks help from a shady guy she met online.
tagline: TO DEPRIVE OF SOMETHING IMPORTANT

title: The Hitman
overview: Unable to pay his debts to the mafia, a man is shot down at a parking lot in the middle of the night by two mobsters. Little do these mobsters know that another killing will take place tonight, in this suspenseful, dramatic film noir short that pays homage to those of the 1940's while incorporating modern elements as well.

title: Broken Writer
overview: In a post pandemic world, an acclaimed writer from Northern Ireland struggles to leave his home and find meaning in his work while his therapist helps him uncover his true self. Does she have something to do with his disappearance ?

title: Psycho Money
overview: A group of sinful bank robbers deal with the repercussions of a mission gone wrong.
tagline: Cash in on sin

title: Something's Up
overview: A few teenagers quickly realize their whole city is controlled by their mothers.
tagline: Your mom may embarrass you, that's nothing compare to their moms.

title: Ignition
overview: Upon hearing about a brutal atrocity, a man must make a decision to exact revenge on his enemy.

title: Надоело умирать
overview: Feature film about Kirill Tolmatsky (Detsl)

title: The Architect: Follow the Protocol
overview: In a twist on the afterlife, a woman awakens to her purpose: crafting personalized hells for the recently departed. But as she delves deeper, a horrifying truth unfolds.

title: Genuine Villains
overview: All hell breaks loose for two groups of hitmen attempting to steal highly coveted secret files worth millions that contain top-secret information.

title: Going Home
overview: A Bengali language crime drama in which a man working for a criminal enterprise finds his profession affecting his everyday relationships.
tagline: The second film by Mashroor Parvez

title: Alteration
overview: Rustam is a Soviet soldier from Uzbekistan who has been drafted for the Afghanistan war. In the war, he experiences the harsh reality of being unable to categorize the friendly and enemy forces into good and evil.

title: Unraveled: Experts on Trial
overview: Billy and Alexis expose serious problems with forensic experts’ testimony in the U.S. court system, citing multiple cases in which people were charged with murders they didn’t commit, based largely on an expert’s opinion.

title: The Conflict
overview: Four people are banded together to pull off a heist, the heist goes according to plan but when a mysterious case is found it leads to the four slipping out of reality
tagline: WHO CAN YOU REALLY TRUST?

title: X-Mas on Fire
overview: A heist on Christmas Eve going horribly wrong.

title: Neutrals
overview: Neutrals is a dark comedy short film about two friends, Chris and Dan; who, after accidentally killing the wrong person, find their night spiraling out of control while being pursued by the vicious Wes and his punks.

title: Midnight City
overview: Ace detectives, Will Fortis and Matt Foxworthy, are at the top of their game. With a new case and an old flame, their skills and their trust will be put to the test.
tagline: Crime never sleeps in Midnight City

title: Movie Day
overview: A group of friends arrange to watch the acclaimed movie "Morbius 2" at night. However, a dark secret from the past comes back to haunt a young man.
tagline: If you close the door, the night could last forever.

title: Chocman Crudo
overview: A chocman addict joins the seedy underworld of drug trafficking in Santiago.
tagline: Winner of a 4,0 in Major University

title: Interrogation
overview: An investigator interrogates the acquaintances of a recently deceased student
tagline: Everybody Knows Something

title: Jack the Ripper: 5 Victims
overview: Three forensic psychology, law enforcement, and historical experts reexamine the infamous case and cast doubt on the widely accepted version of events. The team’s goal is to distinguish truth from fiction and determine how much of what is believed to exist about this renowned murderer is a myth. And why has history hidden the only truth—the account of the five brutally murdered women?

title: Snowball
overview: With finals closing in, a group of desperate college students construct a plan to steal the answers from a respected TA; however, things don't exactly go as planned.

title: A Favor for a Felon
overview: The next chapter in the "Beyond Justice" saga follows Detective Cosmotopoulos as he attempts to unravel a growing conspiracy with the help of an unsavory ally.

title: Cab Fever
overview: Daniel Ford works as a nighttime taxi driver in London; a mentally unstable passenger confesses a plan to murder his fiancée at the end of his ride.
tagline: Daniel Ford works as a nighttime taxi driver in London; a mentally unstable passenger confesses a plan to murder his fiancée at the end of his ride.

title: Let's Kill
overview: We follow Nick G. and Lars K. through a fateful night. They are going to kill their friend Miriam K. Beyond their wish to see someone die, there is no motive. 39 knife stabs. That's all.

title: Life Changes
overview: A group of teenagers struggle with their rapidly changing lives

title: Two Minutes to Death: The Director's Cut
overview: Sam Hardy, a former detective with a dark past, goes to a bar to see a friend. However, the people in the place start to die mysteriously every two minutes and it's up to him to solve the crime and find the killer before it's too late.

title: A Skateboard Story
overview: seven dramatization's of the life of a wanna be skateboarder and filmmaker George, who's trying to get into the right crowd of  kids subsequently leaves him dealing with the wrong ones
tagline: "what does skateboarding mean to you?"

title: The Kidnapping
overview: A group of friends gather for an innocent lunch date, but things turn out to not be as happy as they seem...

title: Tulun maniac
overview: A documentary about the Tulun maniac. From 2001 to 2012, he committed dozens of crimes: he officially confessed to 25 rapes, but investigators believe that there were at least 50 victims. He killed two girls. The victims of the Tulun maniac tell this story with open faces, not afraid of anything.

title: A One Eyed Man In The Kingdom Of The Blind
overview: Cormac O'Connell; a Soho based detective is hired by a widow to retrieve information from a mysterious one eyed man who resides in the island of Jersey.
tagline: a pscyho-geographical odyssey

title: The Bad Connection
overview: A short film following a group of criminals who are trying to plan a heist via a zoom call however, the team cannot seem to get on the same page or act at all competently.
tagline: Crime Lockdown'ed As Well...

title: The Dice
overview: A mysterious man visits people and murders them with a dice. Critically acclaimed thriller about revenge and what is ethically right and wrong.

title: Убаһа этэ 2 АБЫРАХ
overview: The second part of the crime film Meat Horse

title: Musical Chairs
overview: A struggling musician must choose between the woman he loves and the future of his musical career. A fully improvised short film shot in under three hours.
tagline: We don't need anyone to tell us we can't be famous

title: Anatomy of Rats
overview: Smoker, a prefect in a boarding school, maintains order with weed and terror. Within the confines of the school, we witness a twisted version of a coming of age story of unbridled violence in the name of law and order, culminating tragically to the death of the bullied Dickhead. As the incident escalates and things go astray, Smoker faces a moral dilemma: Should he clear himself of further corruption, or should he act as an accomplice of the authorities? Stylistically extravagant, the short uses the secondary school as a metaphor to underpin the absurdity and brutality in ‘the worst of times.’

title: Fatal Mistake
overview: A short-tempered teen and his imbicile friend find themselves owing their boss half a million dollars.

title: Bodies of Evidence: The Butcher Surgeon
overview: The story of how surgeon Ian Paterson duped his patients into believing they had cancer and performed unnecessary surgeries on them before he was caught and jailed for 20 years.

title: Baggio: Decrescendo
overview: A down on his luck Baggio needs money in this gripping tale of materialism, despair and vanity.
tagline: They never thought the Moreno could Baggio

title: Drout
overview: When a trio of childhood friends grows up to have very different paths in life, they are tragically brought together by a serious crime.

title: A Helping Hand
overview: When an ex-convict is released from prison, a friend of his that is terminally ill is in need of some money. The convict wants to help but the two are facing problems of their own.

title: Nighthawks
overview: On the run from gangsters, a lone underdog must flee with an ex-con’s girlfriend to Belgium. But not all is easy going for this unlikely pair.
tagline: And the night goes on and on

title: Rap Artist
overview: Young rapper Rah is preparing for a solo concert and dreams of leaving the small town. Together with his friend, nicknamed Sin, he is ready to do anything for the sake of success. But what does Rahu really need? What path will he take next: will he cope or will he become just a pawn in the game of a criminal gang?

title: Dando: 20 Year Hunt for a Killer
overview: Documentary re-examining the case of Jill Dando's murder, the BBC presenter who was mercilessly shot dead as she entered her Fulham home in April 1999. Two years after her death, Barry George was found guilty of her murder, but following a dramatic retrial in 2008, he was acquitted and released from prison. Now more than 20 years on, this programme looks back at some of the unanswered questions surrounding the case.

title: The Millennium Dome Heist with Ross Kemp
overview: Ross explores the untold story of the 9 month cat-and-mouse game between police and the criminal gang intent on stealing diamonds worth £350 million from an exhibition at the Millennium Dome in London in 2000.

title: The Greatest Truth
overview: Is it a serial killer with just two victims, or something bigger? Maxim’s investigation is tangled with revenge, police corruption, and possible mafia ties. Suspicion looms—one killer, or more? The tension builds to one question: Who killed Frosina—and why? Or was she not the first?

title: BloodGening
overview: A disgruntled professional rounders player seeks revenge.
tagline: It's a BAT time for REVENGE!

title: Driver’s Ed
overview: When a driving instructor and his student have a terrible accident on the road, will they be able to outrun their conscience and the menacing insurance company?
tagline: THE HAZARDS AREN'T JUST ON THE ROADS.

title: Money Machine
overview: A family drama

title: Tales of Phantasmagoria: Evening with the Reaper
overview: In 1959, three women each have a brush with death, the Grim Reaper haunts them until he takes their lives, or they take his. A tale of phantasmagoria.
tagline: God forgives... He does not!

title: Soles
overview: An elderly businessman encounters an uninvited houseguest intent on claiming their ultimate prize.

title: Tremarctos
overview: A sheriff questions the prime suspect of a crime, while the suspect's attorney attempts to unweave through the variables of the investigation. As the conversation unfolds, nothing is as it first seems in this dark, secure room.
tagline: A Sheriff, a Suspect, and His Attorney. One Mystery to be Unraveled.

title: Hundred Short
overview: Facing eviction from a ruthless landlord, two roommates must devise a plan to come up with the rent money that they're one hundred dollars short of.

title: Goon
overview: When two pairs of goons - the expendable underlings of Villians in their wars with the Vigilantes - accidentally collide while trying to steal the same painting, an unlikely family begins to take shape as they each search for what will make them whole.

title: Married to a Psychopath
overview: Never-before-told story of how rural Scottish detective Charles Henry used his spare time to hunt down and bring Malcom Webster, a ruthless killer who targeted wealthy women, to justice.

title: Sethaan Da Sekar'uh
overview: This story revolves around a group of short film makers whom get in trouble when caught by a gangster.
